titleStmt.title: A brief treatise of education, with a particular respect to the children of great personages. : For the use of His Royal Highness, the Prince. / By John Bettam, D.F.S. and tutor to His Highness.
titleStmt.author: Betham, John, d. 1709.

publicationStmt.publisher: by P. Lauren, near the Louvre,

notesStmt.note: Foot of p. 22 has: The end of the first part.
Page 2 occurs twice; page 10 is numbered 9.
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
